Individual: Each player compares their net score on each hole against all other players.
2-Man Teams: Best ball vs best ball, second ball breaks ties.
â€¢ Scored as Front 9, Back 9, and Overall
â€¢ Example: If both teams have 4 (best ball tied), then 5 beats 6 (second ball)
â€¢ Can use stroke or stableford scoring

Standard USGA Formula:
2-Man: 35% + 15%
3-Man: 30% + 20% + 10%
4-Man: 25% + 20% + 15% + 10%

% reduction
